dashboard.description: Metrics from SNMP for EdgeRouter X and host machine

panels.description: Essentially the number of routing decisions made per second.
panels.title: Interrupts / Ctx-Switches (/sec)

targets.query: SELECT difference("ssCpuRawUser") / (difference("ssCpuRawUser") + difference("ssCpuRawNice") + difference("ssCpuRawSystem") + difference("ssCpuRawIdle") + difference("ssCpuRawWait") + difference("ssCpuRawKernel") + difference("ssCpuRawInterrupt") + difference("ssCpuRawSoftIRQ")) AS "User" FROM "snmp.EdgeOS" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT difference("ssCpuRawNice")  / (difference("ssCpuRawUser") + difference("ssCpuRawNice") + difference("ssCpuRawSystem") + difference("ssCpuRawIdle") + difference("ssCpuRawWait") + difference("ssCpuRawKernel") + difference("ssCpuRawInterrupt") + difference("ssCpuRawSoftIRQ")) AS "Nice" FROM "snmp.EdgeOS" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT difference("ssCpuRawSystem")  / (difference("ssCpuRawUser") + difference("ssCpuRawNice") + difference("ssCpuRawSystem") + difference("ssCpuRawIdle") + difference("ssCpuRawWait") + difference("ssCpuRawKernel") + difference("ssCpuRawInterrupt") + difference("ssCpuRawSoftIRQ")) AS "System" FROM "snmp.EdgeOS" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT difference("ssCpuRawIdle")  / (difference("ssCpuRawUser") + difference("ssCpuRawNice") + difference("ssCpuRawSystem") + difference("ssCpuRawIdle") + difference("ssCpuRawWait") + difference("ssCpuRawKernel") + difference("ssCpuRawInterrupt") + difference("ssCpuRawSoftIRQ")) AS "Idle" FROM "snmp.EdgeOS" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT difference("ssCpuRawWait")  / (difference("ssCpuRawUser") + difference("ssCpuRawNice") + difference("ssCpuRawSystem") + difference("ssCpuRawIdle") + difference("ssCpuRawWait") + difference("ssCpuRawKernel") + difference("ssCpuRawInterrupt") + difference("ssCpuRawSoftIRQ")) AS "I/O Wait" FROM "snmp.EdgeOS" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT difference("ssCpuRawKernel")  / (difference("ssCpuRawUser") + difference("ssCpuRawNice") + difference("ssCpuRawSystem") + difference("ssCpuRawIdle") + difference("ssCpuRawWait") + difference("ssCpuRawKernel") + difference("ssCpuRawInterrupt") + difference("ssCpuRawSoftIRQ")) AS "Kernel" FROM "snmp.EdgeOS" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT difference("ssCpuRawInterrupt")  / (difference("ssCpuRawUser") + difference("ssCpuRawNice") + difference("ssCpuRawSystem") + difference("ssCpuRawIdle") + difference("ssCpuRawWait") + difference("ssCpuRawKernel") + difference("ssCpuRawInterrupt") + difference("ssCpuRawSoftIRQ")) AS "Interrupt" FROM "snmp.EdgeOS" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT difference("ssCpuRawSoftIRQ")  / (difference("ssCpuRawUser") + difference("ssCpuRawNice") + difference("ssCpuRawSystem") + difference("ssCpuRawIdle") + difference("ssCpuRawWait") + difference("ssCpuRawKernel") + difference("ssCpuRawInterrupt") + difference("ssCpuRawSoftIRQ")) AS "Soft IRQ" FROM "snmp.EdgeOS" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT (last("hrStorageUsed")/last("hrStorageSize"))  FROM "hrStorageTable"  WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "hrStorageType" = '.1.3.6.1.2.1.25.2.1.2' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "hrStorageDescr" fill(null)

SELECT (last("hrStorageUsed")/last("hrStorageSize"))  FROM "hrStorageTable"  WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "hrStorageType" = '.1.3.6.1.2.1.25.2.1.4' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "hrStorageDescr" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("allReqIn"), 1m) AS "GetReq:In", non_negative_derivative(mean("allReqOut"), 1m) AS "GetReq:Out" FROM ( SELECT "snmpInGetRequests"+"snmpInGetNexts" AS "allReqIn", "snmpOutGetRequests"+"snmpOutGetNexts" AS "allReqOut" FROM "snmp.EdgeOS" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: Router:
list.name: host_influx
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp.EdgeOS" WITH KEY = "agent_host"

list.label: Interface:
list.name: intf_influx
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ifTable" WITH KEY = "ifName" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/

dashboard.title: Ubiquity EdgeRouter X [SNMP] (1756)
